channel.title: 508 client (i get an error when i try to run mu client)
channel.description:
hi ive tried lots od diffrent 508 clients but i keep getting the same error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
i can run a 508 server source fine but not a client any1 please help?

item.title: 508 client (i get an error when i try to run mu client)
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

hi ive tried lots od diffrent 508 clients but i keep getting the same error:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.

i can run a 508 server source fine but not a client any1 please help?
